title: Won 30 games in a row and still have not skipped a single division.
body: As the title says, I have won 30 ranked games in a row, and I am playing very well. But yet, my LP gains go down to 22 every now and then, not up to 30+. I play against people 4 tiers above me, yet still the same thing. Legit haven't skipped a single division, can someone tell me what the f is going on??????????????????? I knew riots system is broke af, but come on seriously....
